group_1.textRight: Hachiiiii! Come on out!

group_1.textLeft: So we're looking for an octopus...
Who's apparently really friendly and has a@heart-shaped pattern on his head,
And who’s so big, he can carry an adult...
Wait... that must mean he's a HUGE octopus...

group_1.textRight: Yes! He must be quite the specimen!

group_1.textLeft: I wasn't complimenting him, though...

group_1.textRight: ...Is something wrong, Rena?
I noticed you've been walking behind me this@entire time...

group_1.textLeft: No, I'm fine.

group_1.textRight: Are you sure?
I'm the only one who's been looking inside all@the places an octopus could hide...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I’ve been following you around and helping@you find him.

group_1.textRight: I mean... I guess the first half of that statement@is true...

group_1.textLeft: Nothing’s wrong with that! It doesn’t matter who@actually finds him as long as one of us does.

group_1.textRight: But Rena, if you helped me look for him, too,
We’d get this over with way faster.

group_1.textLeft: I know, but...
...I just can't stand octopuses.

group_1.textRight: But aren't you a big fan of takoyaki?

group_1.textLeft: I like eating them! I just don't like the actual@thing!
Like...they're kind of gross...

group_1.textRight: Well, I think they're cute!

group_1.textLeft: I mean, for an animal lover like you that makes@sense, but for someone like me...

group_1.textRight: ...It's okay, Rena!

group_1.textLeft: Huh...?

group_1.textRight: If you end up finding Hachi, I'll carry him for you,@of course!
So let's get permission to film our movie...
In the beach house together, alright?

group_1.textLeft: ...Alright.
Okay, I'll check the treetops, and you can check@the shadows behind the rocks and stuff.

group_1.textRight: Rena... are you really trying to look for him...?
*Sigh* It's not easy to find an octopus after all!

group_1.textLeft: It really isn’t...

group_1.textRight: You two have terrible resolve.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:120901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]―!?
Hey, Hikaru!
Well, considering how cocky you were acting back@there, I can see you've not found him, either!

group_1.textRight: Nngh... I never expected an octopus would be@so evasive!
Where have you been looking, Minami?

group_1.textLeft: Where…? You know, behind rocks, up trees...

group_1.textRight: Up trees?! Are you actually trying to find him or@what?!

group_1.textLeft: Of course I am!

group_1.textRight: I’ll help you, then.

group_1.textLeft: What are you―

group_1.textRight: Since you’re too scared to shake the trees,@I’m doing it for you!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:120901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]―!?
Kyaaaaahhhhh!!!

group_1.textRight: Wh-what's happening?!

group_1.textLeft: Ah! My foot my foot my foot my foooooot―!!!

group_1.textRight: Your foot...?
[chara:102250:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What the―

group_1.textLeft: It's a huge octopus!

group_1.textRight: Hey! What's happening here?!

group_1.textLeft: Oh, there’s a heart-shaped pattern on its head...

group_1.textRight: That means this is Hachi, right?

group_1.textLeft: It must be.
C'mon, hurry! Go get the shopkeeper!!!

group_1.textRight: R-roger that!

group_1.textLeft: Kaede! Hurry up and grab him!

group_1.textRight: *Giggle*

group_1.textLeft: What are you laughing at?! I’ll get you for this!
